string-array.name: abasicDefinitionWordList
string-array.item: (of something bad) experienced or present to the maximum degree
a departure from what is normal, usual, or expected, typically one that is unwelcome
solemnly renounce (a belief, cause, or claim)
renounce or reject (something desired or valuable)
repeal or do away with (a law, right, or formal agreement)
leave hurriedly and secretly, typically to avoid detection of or arrest for an unlawful action
difficult to understand; obscure
assent or agree to a demand, request, or treaty

string-array.name: abasicFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: Timmy was _____ after falling off the jungle gym and into the lava
It wasn\'t an ________ they really were making her pull her hair out
After months of late-night cheese binges, she decided to ______ all dairy, embracing the concept of salads and reluctantly turning her back on extra-mature cheddar.
The monk chose to _______ worldly pleasures, seeking enlightenment through meditation and a surprisingly competitive board game collection.
The band was ______ from the hotel after an unfortunate incident involving a flock of pigeons, a confetti cannon, and some questionable room service choices.
Seeking sun over spreadsheets, the overworked employee simply _______, leaving behind nothing but a lingering whiff of rebellion.
He stared at her blankly as if the words were ______.
Later, in the ditch, he ______ they did have the right of way

refusing to be persuaded or to change one\'s mind

represent in outline or in a suggestive way
preventing success or development; harmful; unfavorable
a person who publicly supports or recommends a particular cause or policy

string-array.name: aintermediateFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The charity worker tried to _____ passersby on the street for donations, but after the third failed attempt, had to revise her strategy to involve less eye contact and a faster walking pace.
The coral reef grows slowly due to the ______ of tiny marine organisms, a process that makes for a surprisingly soothing nature documentary but somewhat less exciting live-action adventure.
The seasoned detective possessed remarkable _____ , solving complex cases with an unnerving speed that involved crumpled newspapers, an old magnifying glass, and a collection of half-eaten donuts.
The toddler stood with ______ resolve, arms crossed, refusing to eat broccoli even when it was disguised as a tiny tree, a landing pad for superheroes, or a dinosaur snack.
After repeatedly misplacing her keys, the teacher had to ______ herself, developing an elaborate system of brightly colored keychains, jangling bracelets, and increasingly frantic morning searches.
The artist\'s sketch seemed to ______ the deeper emotions of the subject, hinting at a hidden sorrow with a few skillfully drawn lines and a strategically placed shadow.
The storm created ______ sailing conditions for the small boat, which bravely endured waves the size of small mountains and a distinct feeling among the crew that they should have just stayed home.
She became a passionate _____ for animal rights, fiercely determined to make a difference, one rescued hedgehog and indignantly protesting squirrel at a time.

without a clearly defined shape or form
belonging to a period other than that being portrayed

string-array.name: aadvancedFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The ______ neighborhood was filled with sprawling mansions, suspiciously well-groomed poodles, and a distinct lack of anyone willing to admit to ever having eaten instant noodles.
The power-hungry politician sought to ______ his own reputation with lengthy speeches, questionable statues, and a rather impressive collection ofhats.
The enthusiastic puppy greeted his returning owner with remarkable ______, bouncing around the room with enough energy to power a small village and a rather slobbery tennis ball.
The master of disguise slipped into the party under the ______ of a cheese enthusiast with a questionable accent and a suspiciously large wheel of brie.
The student felt strangely ______ about the final exam, a mix of quiet confidence and the lingering suspicion that she might have forgotten what a "noun" was.
The notoriously stubborn toddler proved surprisingly ______ when bribed with the promise of extra ice cream and a new episode of his favorite cartoon involving talking dinosaurs.
The swirling fog had an ______ shape, shifting and changing form in a way that was either hauntingly beautiful or a great way to make someone accidentally walk into a tree.
The knight in shining armor charging into battle on a segway seemed somewhat ______ , leading to confused looks from the dragon and a hasty rewriting of the history books.

to add a territory or space (typically by force)

showing or feeling no interest, enthusiasm, or concern
a person or thing that is the direct opposite of someone or something else
(of a story or statement) of doubtful authenticity, although widely circulated as being true
approval or praise

string-array.name: aprofessionalFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: To the rebellious teenager, chores and the mere concept of mornings were an absolute ______, to be avoided at all costs.
The ambitious emperor planned to ______ the neighboring island, motivated by dreams of expanding his beach towel collection and building an empire of questionable sandcastles.
The museum\'s fossil collection included the ______ remains of a dinosaur with a particularly grumpy expression and an unfortunate fondness for eating ferns.
With its potent smell and suspicious ability to make even the tiniest paper cut sting, the old-fashioned ______ did its job, though perhaps with excessive enthusiasm.
The ______ audience stared blankly at the comedian, who began to suspect his elaborate mime routine about the perils of mismatched socks might not be as funny as he\'d imagined.
In a world obsessed with speed and instant gratification, the slow-moving sloth was the ______ of modern life, proving the enduring appeal of naps and a relaxed philosophy.
The internet was filled with ______ stories involving celebrity encounters with aliens and surprisingly well-spoken pigeons with a fondness for conspiracy theories.

Earning the dreaded "Most Improved Handwriting" award did little to raise the student\'s spirits, as he considered it rather faint ______ considering his previous penmanship resembled spiderwebs dipped in ink.

string-array.name: aexpertFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The art critic\'s choices seemed entirely ______, declaring a piece of crumpled paper a masterpiece and dismissing an actual sculpture as "too representational of reality."
Those squirrels, with their bushy tails and love of heights, were clearly ______ creatures.
The ancient spell was shrouded in ______ language, its meaning decipherable only by those with a fondness for dusty books, questionable potions, and long naps.
The detective story featured the ______ cast of characters: the gruff detective, the suspicious butler, and the enigmatic femme fatale with a tragic past and a collection of deadly hatpins.
The power-hungry villain sought to ______ control of the kingdom, based mainly on his impressive cape collection and rather loud declarations of his own brilliance.
The ______ monk lived in a tiny hut, subsisting on a diet of water, contemplation, and the occasional stale rice cracker.
The rival scientists hurled ______ at each other, disputing everything from the existence of invisible sheep to the optimal temperature for brewing tea.
The ______ student meticulously copied out her notes, color-coded her flashcards, and practiced her exam answers in front of a slightly bewildered cat.

string-array.name: bbasicFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: After months stuck on the couch with a broken leg, the adventurer feared his hiking muscles might ______, leaving him only able to conquer the daunting staircase to the snack pantry.
Mosquitoes, with their annoying buzz and itchy bites, were the ______ of every delightful summer evening.
The ______ puppy hid behind the sofa, peeking out only occasionally with big, nervous eyes and a hesitantly wagging tail.
The charming con artist sought to ______ the wealthy widow out of her fortune with tales of lost treasure and suspiciously adorable kittens in need of diamond-encrusted collars.
Losing his beloved dog left the man feeling utterly ______, the laughter and tail-wagging enthusiasm gone from his once-vibrant home.
The overly enthusiastic used car salesman attempted to sell the rusty jalopy with a series of outrageous ______ that involved its "untapped race car potential" and "unique vintage aroma."
Hoping to avoid paying for dinner, the shifty customer attempted to ______ the waiter with a confusing story about an escaped octopus and a sudden aversion to seafood.
The politician\'s speech was filled with ______ phrases and dramatic hand gestures, but it was disappointingly short on actual solutions.

string-array.name: bintermediateFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: With promises of extra treats and endless belly rubs, the dog walker attempted to ______ the stubborn basset hound out from under the sofa.
The ruthless food critic, known for his ______ takedowns of even the most earnest culinary attempts, had a particular fondness for deflating the egos of overly ambitious chefs.
The rumor mill churned with wild ______, involving a missing garden gnome, a conspiracy of squirrels, and an elaborate heist of suspiciously tasty birdseed.
After a grueling hike, the team collapsed at the campsite, exhausted but filled with a sense of ______ and the shared aroma of burnt marshmallows and mosquito spray.
Disdaining deception, the CEO opted for brutal ______, informing the board that their latest business venture shared a striking resemblance to a dumpster fire fueled by questionable hair gels.
After weeks of heroic resistance, the sleep-deprived student finally ______ to the lure of her inviting bed and the pile of unread textbooks.
The pirates gathered to ______ on the island, their raucous laughter and questionable sea shanties carrying far across the ocean waves.

The grumpy old man continued to ______ about everything from the weather to the excessive cheerfulness of the squirrels, proving that some people truly excel at finding the dark cloud in every silver lining.

string-array.name: badvancedFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The squirrel _____ convened on the park bench, their agenda presumably involving world nut domination and the strategic hoarding of acorns.
The enthusiastic puppy continued to ______ around the house, blissfully unaware of the potential damage caused by its wagging tail and questionable understanding of valuable vases.
The spokesperson\'s mastery of _________ was impressive: a five-minute speech somehow managed to say absolutely nothing of consequence.
The ambitious toddler, determined to reach the cookie jar, found his explorations ________ by the kitchen gate and his lack of opposable thumbs.
The wily detective managed to _________ the usual bureaucracy with a well-timed distraction involving a runaway donut and several easily confused officers.
The campfire, after several ill-advised attempts to roast marshmallows with a magnifying glass, erupted into a small but alarming ____________.
The odd _______ between the polka-dotted wallpaper, the classical music, and the suspicious collection of rubber chickens gave the detective pause.
The museum guards seemed to be suspiciously turning a blind eye, subtly ________ the daring heist of the world\'s largest cheese sculpture by a team of particularly motivated mice.

string-array.name: bprofessionalFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The antique dealer, tired of haggling over questionable lawn ornaments, decided to simply _______ the giant porcelain gnome to the back of his shop, hoping it would disappear mysteriously.
The disgruntled ________ penned an angry letter to her senator, expressing concerns about the state of the world and her suspicion that squirrels were secretly plotting a hostile takeover.

Lawyers, as usual, managed to _______ the incredibly simple instructions into a legal document resembling a baffling maze, resulting in widespread confusion and several panicked calls to pizza delivery.
After a fierce game of hopscotch, the competitive toddler sported an impressive ________ on his forehead and a newfound respect for the importance of good aim.

The formerly mischievous puppy, after chewing through a suspiciously important-looking document, gazed up at his owner with big, _______ eyes and a wagging tail, hoping that cuteness would be an acceptable form of currency.
The town hall meeting quickly descended into a _________ debate on the ideal toppings for pizza, highlighting the deeply polarizing nature of pineapple and anchovies.
The reckless driver blithely _________ several traffic laws, treating stop signs as mere suggestions and leaving a trail of bewildered pigeons in his wake.

The family gathering, known for its boisterous debates and questionable fashion choices, had a surprisingly ________ atmosphere this year, perhaps due to a general consensus that they\'d all run out of things to argue about.

string-array.name: bexpertFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: After a month-long voyage with the ship\'s chef and his questionable culinary inventions, the sailor\'s newfound _________ made getting back into his uniform a daunting challenge.
The dragon jealously ________ the neighboring kingdom\'s impressive collection of bottle caps, occasionally breathing fire in their general direction to emphasize its point.
Driven by insatiable ________, the villain stole the world\'s entire supply of cheese, causing widespread panic and a resurgence in cracker-related culinary experiments.

A sudden _______ of hair ties caused the hero\'s impeccably styled mane to collapse into disarray just before the ball, leading to a desperate quest involving a lint brush and a suspiciously hairy squirrel.
The overly ambitious "Build a Giant Sandcastle" project ended in a spectacular _______, involving disgruntled seagulls, an unexpected tidal wave, and an impressive amount of soggy sandwiches.

Famed for his wild parties, the eccentric billionaire aimed to _______ his guests with questionable karaoke contests, an experimental jello-sculpting workshop, and a flock of flamingos trained in synchronized swimming.
The floppy-eared bloodhound detective agency, once renowned for sniffing out criminal masterminds, sadly went _______ after the entire team became distracted by a mysteriously tasty-smelling sock.
The seasoned politician, unable to resist a well-timed soundbite, transformed into a full-blown ________, promising free ice cream for all and blaming the sock-stealing gnomes for any economic woes.

string-array.name: cbasicFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The rival art critics engaged in a fierce battle to _____ each other\'s work, using words like "derivative" and "uninspired" as their weapons of choice.
The pop song, with its predictable lyrics and catchy-yet-annoying tune, was painfully _____ of countless other pop songs.
The self-proclaimed fashion _____ ruled the catwalk with an iron fist, a bedazzled scepter, and a deep loathing of anyone wearing comfortable shoes.
A delicate, _____ gown seemed a questionable choice for attempting to wrestle a bear, but the princess was determined to look fabulous while doing it.
The _____ professor lectured for hours about the importance of correct semicolon usage, leaving his students both terrified and vaguely impressed.
The bagpipe player\'s rendition of a mournful _____ caused a mass exodus from the picnic, leaving behind only one slightly deaf squirrel and a flock of confused pigeons.
The employees grew increasingly _____ with their boss, whose ideas included mandatory kazoo practice and a "no talking Tuesday" policy.
The speaker\'s awkward joke and mistimed pratfall managed to thoroughly _____ both himself and the audience.
The research team analyzed the _____ evidence: a half-eaten cheeseburger, a strangely shaped muddy footprint, and a flock of suspiciously smug pigeons.
With a wave of her hand and a suspiciously well-timed gust of wind, the sorceress managed to _____ the swirling fog of confusion and doubt.

string-array.name: cintermediateFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The politician\'s reputation fell into _____ after the unfortunate hot mic incident involving goats, a yodeling contest, and a questionable amount of cheese.
His _____ speech about the evils of socks only served to further divide the room into the staunchly pro-sock camp and the defiantly anti-sock faction.
The _____ professor refused to entertain any theories that didn\'t involve 15th-century poetry, suspicious hand gestures, and a belief in talking squirrels.
The _____ art critic dismissed the exhibit with a frown, declaring it "derivative, uninspired, and lacking in thematically appropriate snacks."
The con artist\'s scheme was built on a foundation of _____ , involving a fake lottery ticket, a sob story about lost penguins, and an unfortunate gullibility on the part of his victims.
The confession obtained under _____ was deemed inadmissible in court, much to the relief of the parrot and its surprisingly proficient lawyer.
The artist had an _____ style, with her paintings featuring everything from dancing hot dogs to philosophical cacti sporting tiny spectacles.
The queen\'s _____ about wearing hats shaped like fruit caused widespread confusion, a boom in the watermelon industry, and the resignation of several bewildered palace gardeners.
Their _____ celebration after solving a particularly tricky crossword involved confetti cannons, a polka band, and an impromptu conga line through the library.
The restaurant\'s attempt at fusion cuisine was an _____ disaster, featuring sushi pizza, spaghetti tacos, and a dessert resembling a pineapple wearing a beret.

string-array.name: cadvancedFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: His heartfelt _____ for the office plant involved a wilted daisy, a single tear, and a suspiciously empty bag of cheese puffs.
The detective\'s skillful questioning managed to _____ a confession from the parrot, who admitted a fondness for shiny objects and a dislike of opera music.
The scandal-plagued politician was accused of _____, leaving him with a depleted bank account, a sudden interest in obscure hobbies, and a one-way ticket to a remote island.
The editor carefully _____ the manuscript, removing typos (along with any references to squirrels with questionable fashion sense).
After a stressful day, a cup of tea and a soothing facemask provided the perfect _____ effect.
His _____ research on the mating habits of goldfish was based on meticulous observation, several romance novels, and a slight obsession with interpretive dance.
Inspired by the great explorers, the adventurous snail set out to _____ Magellan, armed with a map drawn on a lettuce leaf and an impressive sense of determination.
Sitting through the endless budget meeting had a distinctly _____ effect, leaving everyone with a glazed expression and a sudden craving for naps.
The determined activists worked tirelessly to _____ underrepresented groups, ensuring their voices would be heard in the upcoming election.
His disastrous cooking attempts tended to _____ feelings of horror, a frantic search for takeout menus, and the suspicion that he could somehow burn water.

string-array.name: cprofessionalFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The beauty of the rainbow was sadly _____, disappearing as quickly as the toddler\'s promise to share his candy.
The old chest contained a series of _____ love letters involving passionate declarations, questionable poetry, and a surprising number of spelling errors.
With admirable _____, the seasoned gardener greeted news of yet another squirrel-inflicted crop disaster with a philosophical sigh and a renewed subscription to the hot sauce of the month club.
The defendant\'s _____ answers frustrated the lawyer, who longed for a simple yes or no, rather than references to tap-dancing llamas and the importance of cheese.
The environmental advocate passionately _____ the cause of renewable energy, using charts, alarming statistics, and a strategically placed inflatable polar bear.
The ghostly figure, with its flickering form and suspiciously squeaky shoes, proved rather _____, vanishing before anyone could take a halfway decent photo.
The child\'s drawing proudly _____ a love of dinosaurs, a fascination with explosions, and a questionable grasp of perspective.
The incessant beeping of the alarm clock only served to _____ the headache caused by the polka band practicing next door.
The motivational speaker enthusiastically _____ the virtues of waking up at 4 AM, even on those days that involved rain, grumpy cats, and a distinct lack of coffee.
The comedian\'s attempt at stand-up was so _____ that the audience resorted to throwing vegetables and attempting to communicate their displeasure through mime.

string-array.name: cexpertFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The disgruntled theater critic unleashed a torrent of _____ remarks about the play, comparing it to a confused sloth attempting interpretive dance.
The politician, caught in a lie, began to _____ , offering vague promises of jam tomorrow and blaming the disappearance of the national cookie supply on a rogue band of squirrels.
A deep _____ developed between the cat and the goldfish, mainly centered around differing opinions on the concept of personal space and snacking preferences.
With a _____ sigh, he picked up the scattered papers, his attempt at writing a novel proving as focused and successful as a toddler conducting brain surgery.
The _____ charity fundraiser turned out to be a scam, its organizers disappearing with the donations and a curiously large collection of rubber duckies.
The _____ villain, with his suspiciously twirled mustache and fondness for dramatic capes, seemed plucked straight from a cheesy comic book.
Social media influencers began to _____ unrest with surprisingly effective memes and poorly photoshopped images of squirrels in questionable hats.
The notoriously _____ weather changed abruptly from sunshine to hail to a sudden downpour of maple syrup, leaving everyone confused and slightly sticky.
The _____ scholar could quote obscure 12th-century poetry, identify the mating calls of extinct birds, yet remained utterly baffled by the concept of self-checkout machines.
Dressed in a golden gown, a tiara, and enough glitter to blind a satellite, the princess was positively _____ for her visit to the local turnip-carving festival.

string-array.name: dbasicFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The _____ leak in the roof demanded immediate attention, especially as the weather report involved suspiciously large rain clouds and a possible frognado.
Though morally questionable, bribing the pigeons with stale popcorn proved an _____ way to reclaim the park bench.
To _____ his guilt for eating all the cookies, he offered to do the dishes (though his track record on that front wasn\'t exactly stellar).
The frustrated editor tried to _____ several misspelled words, a questionable yodeling reference, and a strangely detailed ode to cheese from the manuscript.
The lawyer\'s argument included so many _____ details that the jury began to suspect he was just trying to stall for time.
The celebrity chef enthusiastically _____ the virtues of kale smoothies, despite the skeptical looks and sudden urge to flee toward the nearest pizza place.
Despite years of searching, no dinosaur remains were ever found, save for a few _____ footprints and a rather suspicious-looking pebble.
The movie censors decided to _____ several scenes of questionable taste, including one involving interpretive dance, a giant squid, and a concerning amount of mayonnaise.
His _____ theory that squirrels were secretly plotting world domination was dismissed with amused eye rolls and a gentle suggestion of less coffee.

The philosopher\'s argument for _____ collapsed when he absentmindedly bumped into a chair, acknowledging the existence of the external world.
The art critic dismissed the forgery as a _____ imitation, noting the imposter\'s unfortunate overuse of glitter.
The couple\'s _____ lifestyle involved meticulously planned outfits, tasteful home decor, and a shared calendar app.
With a _____ expression, the security guard watched the teenager suspiciously eyeing the cookie display.
The invading army sought to _____ the neighboring country, primarily to gain access to their superior pastry selection.
After a Thanksgiving _____ featuring three kinds of pie, a deep sense of regret settled upon the guests.

string-array.name: gadvancedFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The detective\'s _____ surveillance involved binoculars, a long trench coat, and questionable attempts to blend in with a flock of pigeons.
The actor\'s naturally _____ complexion made his beach vacation photos rather alarming after a weekend out of the sun.
The professor\'s lecture took a series of _____ turns, covering everything from taxidermy to the mating rituals of the garden snail.
The disgruntled employee went on a lengthy _____ about the unfair vending machine snack selection.
The dusty _____ on forgotten library shelves contained wisdom from ages past and surprisingly effective cockroach eradication techniques.
The aspiring politician transformed into a shameless _____ in the presence of wealthy donors, eagerly agreeing with any opinion that might result in a campaign contribution.
After a large Thanksgiving meal, the family dog lay _____ on the rug, barely able to lift an eyelid.
The school play was an unintentional _____ of Shakespeare, featuring a lightsaber duel and a tap-dancing chorus line.
The politician delivered a _____ speech against corruption, conveniently ignoring questions about his own questionable donations.
The overloaded cart _____ noisily through the grocery aisles, leaving a trail of dislodged cereal boxes in its wake.

offense or annoyance
to find fault with or reproach severely; to scold
designed to be useful or practical rather than attractive
conformity to truth in statement; accuracy
a trace of something that is disappearing or no longer exists
a change of circumstances or fortune, typically one that is unwelcome or unpleasant

string-array.name: gprofessionalFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The motivational speaker\'s speech relied on _____ clichés, leaving the audience feeling uninspired and slightly sleepy.
The customer service representative faced a _____ customer who insisted that his pet parrot qualified for a frequent flyer card.
The politician\'s history of scandals hinted at a deep moral _____, making his promises of honesty ring rather hollow.
The internet meme spread with _____ speed, appearing on every social media platform and even inexplicably on Aunt Ethel\'s embroidered pillows.
He took _____ at the slightest criticism, interpreting a raised eyebrow as a declaration of war.
The teacher had to _____ the student for attempting to build a potato-powered time machine in chemistry class.
The office building had a strictly _____ design, favoring gray carpets and flickering fluorescent lights.
His reputation for _____ preceded him, though occasionally he just happened to be telling the truth.
The old photograph was the only _____ of a bustling town square, now replaced by a strip mall.
The stock market\'s unpredictable _____ left investors feeling both exhilarated and vaguely nauseous.

string-array.name: gexpertFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: The rival politician sought to _____ his opponent with a series of thinly-veiled accusations about her questionable taste in hats.
The child _____ displayed a talent for both the violin and breaking windows with a poorly-aimed slingshot.
The disgruntled theater critic penned a _____ review, comparing the play to a root canal without anesthesia.
The coach _____ the team after their dismal performance, his words echoing unpleasantly off the locker room walls.
The protesters were undeniably _____, their chants reverberating through the city streets.
The teenagers\' _____ act of spray-painting a mustache on the school statue was met with less amusement than they anticipated.
The _____ con artist charmed his way into the hearts (and wallets) of unsuspecting victims.
The puppy\'s _____ expression quickly melted the hearts of even the most committed cat-lovers.
The revolution sought to throw off the _____ of the oppressive regime, yearning for freedom.
A gentle _____ rustled the leaves, offering a momentary respite from the summer heat.

The labyrinthine bureaucracy, with its _____ forms and endless procedures, seemed designed to frustrate even the most determined individual.
The scandal quickly _____ the senator\'s career, leaving his reputation in tatters.
Her _____ attempts to remain focused resulted in piles of half-completed tasks and a growing sense of unease.
The _____ path through the icy forest proved treacherous, making for a less-than-pleasant hike.
The horror movie\'s chilling soundtrack induced a distinct sense of _____ in the audience.
The candidate\'s impressive resume deemed him _____ for the position, despite his questionable hairstyle.
His habit of _____ about his accomplishments made him rather tedious company at dinner parties.

string-array.name: hintermediateFillInTheBlank
string-array.item: His unusually bright tie made him rather _____ in the otherwise somber boardroom.
The politician\'s _____ response to the crisis statement left the public both uninformed and mildly concerned.
A faint _____ odor lingered in the old library, hinting at forgotten lunches and decaying paperbacks.
The _____ meticulously tracked his bus fare expenses in a leather-bound ledger.
The critic\'s review contained a touch of _____, suggesting the novel\'s potential was overshadowed by its overuse of adverbs.
The notoriously _____ witness offered only "yes" or "no" answers, leaving the courtroom buzzing with speculation.
The philosopher pondered the _____ of a table, questioning whether it was truly a table if no one was there to dine upon it.
The hostess\'s _____ smile seemed a bit strained after hours of forced cheerfulness.
The patient\'s _____ eye movements made the optometrist\'s examination surprisingly difficult.
The psychic laid out her tarot cards, preparing to _____ a future filled with unexpected parking tickets and questionable haircuts.
